languages.text: "Вы знаете, Лорд-капитан. Я поддержу любой ваш приказ, но вот оставлять ксеноса в экипаже, особенно после всего..." {n}Абеляр бросает напряженный взгляд на нижний уровень мостика.{/n} "...после всего, что произошло по ее вине — не слишком разумно".

"You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."
languages.original_text: "Вы знаете, Лорд-капитан. Я поддержу любой ваш приказ, но вот оставлять ксеноса в экипаже, особенно после всего..." {n}Абеляр бросает напряженный взгляд на нижний уровень мостика.{/n} "...после всего, что произошло по ее вине — не слишком разумно".

traits.locale_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but making a xenos part of the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard throws an intense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that had transpired because of her — it isn't very wise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but making a xenos part of the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard throws an intense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that had transpired because of her — it isn't very wise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，如您所知，我会服从您的一切命令。不过，发生了这么多事情……”{n}阿贝拉德紧张地看了一眼舰桥下方。{/n}“……更何况，这一切归根结底都是她引起的。我认为，坚持把这个异形留下来，恐怕不是什么明智的决定。”
languages.original_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，如您所知，我会服从您的一切命令。不过，发生了这么多事情……”{n}阿贝拉德紧张地看了一眼舰桥下方。{/n}“……更何况，这一切归根结底都是她引起的。我认为，坚持把这个异形留下来，恐怕不是什么明智的决定。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ya sabe que respaldaré cualquier orden suya, pero conservar a la xenos en el séquito, especialmente después de todo lo que...». {n}Abelard lanza una mirada tensa al nivel inferior del puente.{/n} «... de todo lo que ha ocurrido por su culpa, no sería sensato».
languages.original_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ya sabe que respaldaré cualquier orden suya, pero conservar a la xenos en el séquito, especialmente después de todo lo que...». {n}Abelard lanza una mirada tensa al nivel inferior del puente.{/n} «... de todo lo que ha ocurrido por su culpa, no sería sensato».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vous savez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Je ne contesterai jamais un de vos ordres, mais je ne crois pas que ce soit une bonne idée de garder cette xénos dans votre entourage, surtout après... tout ce qui est arrivé par sa faute, » {n}dit Abélard en jetant un regard inquiet au pont inférieur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Je ne contesterai jamais un de vos ordres, mais je ne crois pas que ce soit une bonne idée de garder cette xénos dans votre entourage, surtout après... tout ce qui est arrivé par sa faute, » {n}dit Abélard en jetant un regard inquiet au pont inférieur.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wisst, Lord Captain, ich werde jeden Eurer Befehle unterstützen, aber die Xenos im Gefolge zu behalten, zumal nach allem ..." {n}Abelard wirft einen strengen Blick auf die untere Brücke.{/n} "... nach allem, was wegen ihr passiert ist – das wäre unklug."
languages.original_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst, Lord Captain, ich werde jeden Eurer Befehle unterstützen, aber die Xenos im Gefolge zu behalten, zumal nach allem ..." {n}Abelard wirft einen strengen Blick auf die untere Brücke.{/n} "... nach allem, was wegen ihr passiert ist – das wäre unklug."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン。どのようなご命令でも支持いたしますが、異種族を護衛につけるというのは…」{n}アベラルドは緊張した面持ちで下層ブリッジに視線を投げかけている。{/n}「…彼女が原因で起こったすべてのことを考えると、賢明なこととは言えません」
languages.original_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン。どのようなご命令でも支持いたしますが、異種族を護衛につけるというのは…」{n}アベラルドは緊張した面持ちで下層ブリッジに視線を投げかけている。{/n}「…彼女が原因で起こったすべてのことを考えると、賢明なこととは言えません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, verdiğiniz tüm emirleri desteklerim ama zenoları maiyetinizde tutma kararı, hem de yaşanan onca şeyden sonra..." {n}Abelard, alt köprüye gergin bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Onun yüzünden yaşanan onca şeyden sonra pek akıllıca olmaz."
languages.original_text: "You know, Lord Captain. I will support any order you give, but to keep the xenos in the retinue, especially after everything..." {n}Abelard casts a tense look at the lower bridge.{/n} "...after everything that has transpired because of her — it would not be wise."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, verdiğiniz tüm emirleri desteklerim ama zenoları maiyetinizde tutma kararı, hem de yaşanan onca şeyden sonra..." {n}Abelard, alt köprüye gergin bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Onun yüzünden yaşanan onca şeyden sonra pek akıllıca olmaz."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
